name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course focuses primarily on qualitative research design and proposal writing. It also highlights the important connections between design and proposal structure. Students will learn the components of qualitative research design and the ways in which these relate to one another to better understand the logic and coherence of a qualitative study. Through proposal writing, they will also learn to communicate and justify their own research design to the audience.
